original_text: He answered and said unto them, Well hath Esaias prophesied of you hypocrites, as it is written, This people honoureth me with their lips, but their heart is far from me.
korean_text: 이르시되 이사야가 너희 외식하는 자에 대하여 잘 예언하였도다 기록하였으되 이 백성이 입술로는 나를 공경하되 마음은 내게서 멀도다

sentences.original_text: He answered and said unto them
Well hath Esaias prophesied of you hypocrites
This people honoureth me with their lips
but their heart is far from me
